original_text: But when the police arrived at the prison, they did not find the apostles there. So the police returned to the Jewish leaders and they told them the news.
korean_text: 부하들이 가서 옥에서 사도들을 보지 못하고 돌아와

sentences.original_text: But when the police arrived at the prison,
they did not find the apostles there.
So the police returned to the Jewish leaders
and they told them the news.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들에게 그 소식을 말해주었습니다.
